text: After telling GOP to downsize convention due to COVID-19, N.C. governor Cooper @NC_Governor marches in crowded protest https://t.co/XqRIPGe05i #Jackass

urls.title: After telling GOP to downsize convention due to COVID-19, N.C. governor marches in crowded protest
urls.description: The state's Democratic chief executive Roy Cooper said Tuesday that 'planning for a scaled down convention, with fewer people, social distancing and face coverings is a necessity.'
